title: True friend
creator_credit: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Moving to a new city and making new friends is never easy, and Elizabeth Phan found it particularly difficult. Gradually, though, Phan was able to learn the meaning of the words ‘true friend’.
creator_credit_for_label: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
